issue.title: [CI][Gandiva][Linux] Fix Crossbow setup failure
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11621](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11621). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
https://github.com/ursacomputing/crossbow/runs/1892434027

```

Collecting cryptography>=2.3 (from jwcrypto>=0.5.0->github3.py)
  Downloading https://files.pythonhosted.org/packages/27/5a/007acee0243186123a55423d49cbb5c15cb02d76dd1b6a27659a894b13a2/cryptography-3.4.4.tar.gz (545kB)
    Complete output from command python setup.py egg_info:
    Traceback (most recent call last):
      File "<string>", line 1, in <module>
    ModuleNotFoundError: No module named 'setuptools'
```

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11621?focusedCommentId=17284495) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 9491
